title: Apple Warns iPhone Production Being Disrupted by China Covid-19 Restrictions; The company's high-end iPhone 14 Pro and Pro Max models are being affected by reduced production capacity
text:
"We now expect lower iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max shipments than we previously anticipated and customers will experience longer wait times to receive their new products," the company said.

( More to Come)

Apple Warns iPhone Production Being Disrupted by China Covid-19 Restrictions
